thread.title: The Top 10 Hip Hop Singles & Videos Of The Week: DMX, The Thirstiness Of 2017 & Post Malone
thread.title_full: The Top 10 Hip Hop Singles & Videos Of The Week: DMX, The Thirstiness Of 2017 & Post Malone

author: Cherise Johnson
title: The Top 10 Hip Hop Singles & Videos Of The Week: DMX, The Thirstiness Of 2017 & Post Malone
text:
0 
This past week, DMX and Swizz Beatz dropped some heat. We also got Saturday’s DX Breakdown from Justin Hunte, highlighting the immense amount of thirstiness 2017 has kicked off with, and lastly, Post Malone explained why he stopped smoking weed. DMX & Swizz Beatz Bring “Bane Iz Back” 
DMX has reportedly been working with Swizz Beatz for his comeback album and fans now have a taste of what’s to come from the New York natives in the form of “Bane Iz Back.” 2017’s Thirsty Start From Nicki Minaj To Soulja Boy 
2017’s start has been loud and obnoxious. Ringing in the new year was Nicki Minaj’s relationship status with Meek Mill, Troy Ave’s “Sex Tape,” and of course Soulja Boy and Chris Brown getting ready to box it out . 
We get insight on why this may or may not be a good thing. Post Malone Doesn’t Smoke Weed Anymore 
In a recent interview, Post Malone shared a crazy story on Shade 45 radio show Whoolywood Shuffle with DJ Whoo Kid about why he doesn’t smoke marijuana anymore. 
Apparently, he was given a laced joint (“a wet jimmy”) that had him tripping so bad he’s decided to leave the plant alone. 
View the Top 10 for the week ending January 14 below:
